Producer: Zane W. Levitt, Mark Yellen, Liz McDermott
Synopsis: Barkeep Tanya (Lara Flynn Boyle) slings drinks to support her husband, Henry (Luca Bercovici), an ex-baseball player benched by a broken knee. Tanya, who's planning a comfortable life with the insurance payout from her husband's accident, is troubled when she learns that Henry, in a moment of religious fervor, declared the money was tainted by evil. Now, with the help of small-time hustler Benny (Peter Dobson), Tanya has a foolproof plan to get Henry to hand over the cash.
Title: The Big Squeeze
